SkillInfo: Unleashes a mighty forward swing with a giant ax, dealing 490% ATK of Physical DMG, and restores <color=#ff9900>#1[i]</color> SP upon hit.

Charge at the target while swinging a giant axe, dealing 360% x 3 ATK of Physical DMG to nearby enemies, then toss the axe into the sky. When the axe slams on the ground, deal 2900% ATK of AOE Physical DMG near the target. Bloody Sentence deals <color=#ff9900>#1[i]%</color> more shield DMG and <color=#ff9900>#2[i]</color> more DMG against shields.
ELF's Physical DMG increases by <color=#ff9900>#1[i]%</color>; deals 200% more damage against shields or enemies that only take fixed amounts of damage.
Uses the Blazing Pinion to deal 400% ATK of Fire DMG against the target spot, and restores <color=#ff9900>#1[i]</color> SP upon hit.

Perform Jingwei's Dance to heal Valkyries on the field for <color=#ff9900>#1[i]</color> HP per 0.25s for a total of 5 times. Once the Dance ends, the ELF releases her fiery energy to deal 1400% ATK of Fire DMG to enemies near the Valkyrie.
ELF's Fire DMG increases by <color=#ff9900>#1[i]%</color> and heals <color=#ff9900>#2[i]%</color> more HP for the Valkyrie.
Swings her scythe to unleash multiple ATKs, dealing a total of 560% ATK of Ice DMG; restores <color=#ff9900>#1[i]</color> SP upon hit.

Hurls the scythe to deal 400%x5 ATK of AOE Ice DMG and summons Death's Aura that immobilizes enemies within and makes them take 5% more Ice DMG. Selune's Elegy attacks random targets in the aura 7 times (each target takes no more than 4 hits), with each attack dealing <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> ATK of Ice DMG to the target and nearby enemies. Afterwards, it deals 1500% ATK of Ice DMG to enemies within the aura, knocks them airborne and inflicts 18 Rime Trauma.
ELF's Ice DMG increases by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color>. Enemies will still take 5% more Ice DMG for <color=#ff9900>#2[i]</color>s after escaping from Death's Aura.
Each of ELF's Basic ATK hits boosts ELF's Total DMG by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> for 5s; stacks up to 3 times.
ELF's Basic ATK has a 10% chance to additionally deal <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> ATK of Ice DMG; CD: 20s.
After an enemy is knocked airborne, the duration of the Freeze effect extends by 20% and it deals <color=#ff9900>#2[f1]%</color> bonus Ice DMG.
After unleashing ELF's Ultimate, ELF gains <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> Total DMG for 15s (effect duration resets when triggered again).
ELF gains 1% Ice DMG for each hit against the same target; effect maxes at <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> and resets when the target is changed.
<color=#23b2e2>[Team-triggered]</color> With any Valkyrie(s) capable of dealing Ice DMG on the team, the Ice Vulnerability effect of Death's Aura is enhanced to <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color>.
ELF's SP recovery rate increases by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color>.
ELF's Ultimate CD shortens by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color>.
ELF's initial SP increases by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]</color>.
ELF's Total DMG increases by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> .
ELF's Ice DMG increases by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color>.
Fires multiple shells, dealing 550% ATK of Fire DMG against the target and restores 3 SP upon hit; CD: 2s.

Force activates the QTE of Valkyrie(s) capable of dealing Fire DMG on the team, and summons a magic fire circle (lasts 10s) to seal enemies within, dealing 5x1000% ATK of Fire DMG against them and inflicting a debuff on them to make them take <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> more All Elemental DMG.

<color=#23b2e2>[Team-triggered] </color>With a Valkyrie capable of dealing Fire DMG as the team leader, the whole team gains <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> Fire DMG and <color=#ff9900>#2[f1]%</color> Ice and Lightning DMG.
When a Valkyrie performs Ultimate Evasion, the ELF restores 15 SP and provides a buff for the Valkyrie, which boosts her Fire DMG by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> for 8s; CD: 15s.
Basic ATK deals <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> ATK of Physical DMG.

ELF enters burst mode and launches fast attacks in midair for 10s. Each sequence deals <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> ATK of Physical DMG. ELF's Crit Rate increases by <color=#ff9900>#2[f1]%</color> every second (5 stacks max) until burst mode ends. ELF skill button is lit up at max stacks.
<color=#23b2e2>[Team]</color> Team deals <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> bonus Physical DMG and an additional <color=#ff9900>#2[f1]%</color> bonus Physical DMG if all 3 members are the same type.
When ELF skill is cast again during burst mode or when burst mode ends, ELF leaps up to deal <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> x2 ATK of Physical DMG and ELF skill enters cooldown.
Basic ATKs deal 540% ATK of Lightning DMG. Restores <color=#ff9900>#1[f2]</color> SP every second in battle.

Shoots multiple thunderbolts dealing 300%x2+160%x10+560% ATK of Lightning DMG and boosting Lightning DMG taken by enemies hit by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> for 6s (can be refreshed). If the last hit lands on a single target, it deals 800% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG and inflicts 10 Paralyze Trauma.
<color=#23b2e2>[Team]</color> With a Fast ATK leader, the team deals <color=#ff9900>#1[i]%</color> bonus Elemental DMG.
Restores <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]</color> HP for the deployed Valkyrie when her HP drops below 50%. CD: 50s.
ELF has two Basic ATKs:\nBasic ATK 1: Launch two water projectiles each dealing 240% ATK of Ice DMG.\nBasic ATK 2: Swing the sword to emit a marching wave dealing 480% ATK of Ice DMG.

Channel a formation to gather enemies in a large area dealing 800% + 5x100% + 800% ATK of Ice DMG over 7s. Enemies within become Sunken and take <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> bonus Ice DMG until the formation ends.\nDealing over 500 Ice DMG to enemies within the formation enhances the gathering for 1s. CD: 1s.
<color=#23b2e2>[Team]</color> With one or more Ice DMG dealers on the team, Sunken enemies take <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> bonus Ice DMG.
When a QTE hits, ELF launches a blade wave dealing <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> ATK of Ice DMG to enemies on its path. CD: 10s.
ELF has two forms of Basic ATK:\nBasic ATK 1: Use scissors to snip twice each dealing 300% ATK of Fire DMG.\nBasic ATK 2: Spin scissors to deal 150% ATK of Fire DMG 4 times.

Casts a spell at the target location to create a magic field that immobilizes enemies within inflicting 6 Ignite Trauma, and explodes with a 2.5s delay dealing 3x700% + 1800% ATK of Fire DMG throughout the duration. Enemies within the field take <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> bonus Fire DMG for 13s. Restores 200 HP for all Valkyries.
After ELF's Ultimate is cast, team obtains 20 charges of HP regen. Any team member whose HP is below 100% consumes 1 charge to restore 60 HP when she hits an enemy.
When a Valkyrie uses a weapon skill, ELF summons a black hole to fire 6 magic missiles each dealing 140% ATK of Fire DMG. CD: 15s.
ELF has two forms of Basic ATK:\nBasic ATK 1: Launch syringes to deal 5x120% ATK of Lightning DMG.\nBasic ATK 2: Unleash biochemical lightning to deal 3x200% ATK of Lightning DMG.

Take out a massive syringe and smash it at enemies to trigger a toxic explosion and deal 1800% ATK of Lightning DMG. The syringe then stays on the field and spread toxin to deal 7x300% ATK of Lightning DMG. Casting Ultimate reduces character switch CD by 8s. The 1st hit makes enemies take <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> bonus Lightning DMG for 15s. Ultimate inflicts Fatigue on enemies hit for 8s and each stack deals 20% ATK of Lightning DMG per second. Triggering it again resets the duration. 5 stacks max.
<color=#23b2e2>[Lineup]</color> ELF deals 25% bonus Lightning DMG when the team leader is a Lightning DMG dealer.

Valkyries dealing Combo ATK DMG adds 1 to the count for up to once per second. When the count reaches 3, ELF performs a Joint ATK, clears the count, and launches multiple syringes at the target, dealing 10x80% ATK of Lightning DMG. CD: 20s. The count cannot exceed 2 during CD and starts at 2 when the battle begins.

ELF has two forms of Basic ATK:
Basic ATK 1: Attack continuously dealing 2100% ATK of Physical DMG.
Basic ATK 2: Thrust forward to deal 2100% ATK of Physical DMG.
Restore <color=#ff9900>#1[f2]</color> SP every second in battle.

Blink to the target location, pull in enemies, and unleash AoE attacks dealing 600% x 8 ATK of Physical DMG. Afterwards, pull in enemies again and deal 1800% ATK of Physical DMG. Enemies hit are inflicted with Dissociated stacks (lasting 5s) and each stack makes them take <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> bonus Physical DMG. 5 stacks max. Ultimate also reduces switch CD.
Switching Valkyrie boosts team Total DMG by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> for <color=#ff9900>#3[f1]s</color>. <color=#ff9900>#2[i]</color> stacks max.
ELF's initial SP increases by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]</color>.

This ELF has two Basic ATKs:\nBasic ATK 1: Fires 3 consecutive magic projectiles, dealing 3x <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> ATK of Ice DMG.\nBasicATK 2: Fires 1 large magic projectile resulting in a 3-hit ATK, dealing 3x <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> ATK of Ice DMG. ELF regains <color=#ff9900>#2[f1]</color>SP per second in combat.

The ELF uses enhanced magic, increasing Ice DMG taken by enemies by <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> for <color=#ff9900>#2[f1]</color>s (Triggering it again resets the duration). She then transforms, gathering in strength for a powerful magic ATK that draws in surrounding enemies. She finishes with an ATK that deals <color=#ff9900>#3[f1]%</color> ATK of Ice DMG. Her Ultimate reduces switch CD by 8s.
Launches Combo ATK against frozen enemies on the field, dealing <color=#ff9900>#1[f1]%</color> ATK of Ice DMG (CD <color=#ff9900>#2[f1]</color>s).
